Metadata.title: Golden Luna
Metadata.description: Apartment Golden Luna is the perfect place for a getaway in San Pedro del Pinatar, just 1.8 km from Villananitos Beach and La Mota Beach. Enjoy free parking, Wi-Fi, and excellent sleeping conditions in our cozy air-conditioned apartments, which feature 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and 2 bathrooms. Relax on the terrace, swim in the outdoor pool, or explore the surrounding area, which offers opportunities for hiking, fishing, and squash. Our staff speaks English, Spanish, French, and Norwegian and is always ready to assist you. Book your ideal accommodation today!
Metadata.keywords: Spain, holidays, pool, beach, sun, 2 bedrooms, Costa Calida, bike paths, cycling tours, SUP, jet skiing, kayaking, pink lakes, flamingos, wellness, paella, delicious food, relaxation, family holidays, vacations, Easter in Spain, Fire Festival, attractions, vacation rentals, active recreation, Costa Calida beaches.

hero.subtitle: Feel at home, away from home
hero.imageAltText: Modern white building with stone accents and glass balconies, featuring an open gate leading to a fenced courtyard. The structure has clean lines and is surrounded by a paved sidewalk and some greenery under a clear blue sky.

testimonials.title: Our testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Check out our testimonials from our Facebook page

aga.title: Experience Luxury
aga.text: Golden Luna is a fantastic apartment! It's very clean, comfortable, and beautifully decorated. Great amenities in a quiet, lovely area. Highly recommend staying here!
aga.imgAltText: A woman with shoulder-length dark hair and a white shirt sits indoors, looking directly at the camera. The background is softly blurred with elements of a cafe setting.

ewelina.title: Perfect Beach!
ewelina.text: Clean and equipped. Perfect for a getaway with friends. Close to the beach, playground, and obstacle course, just 2 minutes away Charming town, highly recommend!
ewelina.imgAltText: A person with shoulder-length dark hair and wearing a white top is looking at the camera against a neutral background.

paulina.title: Fantastic Family Getaway!
paulina.text: We visited in May with the family, and it was fantastic! Fresh, tastefully decorated apartment with two bathrooms. Close to the beach, shops, and a lovely pool. Highly recommend!
paulina.imgAltText: A woman with long, straight dark hair and a light blue button-up shirt smiles at the camera. The background is a soft, blurred blue

ania.title: Cozy Apartment!
ania.text: Fantastic apartment! Clean, cozy, and fragrant interior. The kitchen area is well-equipped, and the bathrooms have spacious showers. We are very satisfied and highly recommend!
ania.imgAltText: A woman with curly red hair and a neutral expression is standing against a pink background.

gallery.houseFromOutside: Modern white house with stone accents, glass balconies, and an open gate leading to a courtyard.
gallery.lounge: Living area with gray sofa, dining table, and kitchen in background; circular wall art and natural light.
gallery.dinningRoom: Bright dining room with white table, colorful chairs, gray sofa, and modern art on walls.
gallery.kitchen: White kitchen with cabinets, stainless steel appliances, and bar stools at the island.
gallery.kitchenFirstPart: White kitchen with metallic fridge, microwave, dishwasher, and a black bowl for contrast.
gallery.kitchenSecondPart: Minimalist kitchen with stovetop, oven, sink, and clear counters.
gallery.firstRoom: Bedroom with white bedspread, lavender pillows, boat paintings, and natural light.
gallery.secondRoom: Bedroom with twin beds, patterned bedspreads, wall art, and cozy ambiance.
gallery.firstBathroom: White bathroom with wall mirror, sleek vanity, and light gray walls.
gallery.secondBathroom: Bathroom with tiled walls, walk-in shower, sink, mirror, and laundry basket.
gallery.pool: Kidney-shaped pool with palm trees, lounge chairs, and nearby buildings.
gallery.playground: Colorful playground with slides, swings, and striped fence.
gallery.playgroundNearSea: Playground by the sea with marina views and beach sand.
gallery.beach: Beach promenade with palm trees, outdoor café, and ocean view.
gallery.park: Empty parking garage with white walls, red stripes, and marked spaces.

house.title: House
house.firstPart: Apartment Golden Luna is a stylish and modern apartment with two bedrooms, a living room, and a fully equipped kitchen that includes a refrigerator and coffee maker. It features two bathrooms with showers and hairdryers, air conditioning for comfort during warm days, and a terrace that opens up to a lush garden, perfect for relaxation.
house.secondPart: Guests benefit from Wi-Fi, garage parking, and parking spaces available in front of the building. For active guests, the apartment complex offers access to a squash court, a swimming pool, and a green garden area. The staff speaks English, Spanish, and Polish.

surrounding.title: Surrounding
surrounding.firstPart: Apartment Golden Luna is located in San Pedro del Pinatar, just 1.8 km from the beaches of Villananitos and La Mota, known for their ideal swimming and snorkeling conditions. La Puntica beach is also nearby, just 2.1 km away. This area is renowned for its scenic hiking trails, numerous cycling routes, and excellent fishing opportunities.
surrounding.secondPart: San Pedro del Pinatar is also renowned for its therapeutic mud baths, popular across Europe. The area has many restaurants and shops for a convenient and enjoyable stay. The Region of Murcia International Airport is 35 km away, and Alicante Airport is 75 km from the property.

rent.title: Rental information
rent.firstPart: It's worth mentioning that we are listed on both Booking and Airbnb. If you're not feeling completely confident, you can always book the property through these trusted platforms. However, to save money and enjoy more flexibility, feel free to book directly with us by sending a message or giving us a call to arrange your preferred dates
rent.secondPart: Once you are ready to make a reservation, please contact Mrs. Anita Kołodziejczyk. She is responsible for managing your booking and will be available on-site to assist you with every step of the process, ensuring a smooth and pleasant experience.

bookingProcedure.title: Booking Procedure
bookingProcedure.subtitle: How to Book Your Reservation: Step-by-Step Guide
bookingProcedure.firstCol: We’re on Booking.com and Airbnb. For better rates, book directly with us. Check airlines, city, and flight times to plan your dates.
bookingProcedure.secondCol: The client is required to pay 20% of the total booking amount. This payment should be made within 72 hours of booking confirmation.
bookingProcedure.thirdCol: The client must pay 50% of the remaining balance halfway before the arrival date to ensure arrival preparations are completed.
bookingProcedure.forthCol: The remaining amount must be paid the day before arrival and recorded in our account to enable the check-in process.

important.secondPart: each of us, besides renting, has another job.

firstContact.trigger: Still have questions ? Call Monika Nowaczyk
firstContact.langPreference: Ms. Monika speaks Polish and English, so if you have any questions, it’s better to write

secondContact.langPreference: Ms. Anita speaks Polish, Spanish, and English, so if you have any questions, it’s better to write.
